Name: isolated microphthalmia 6
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance reduction in eye size that is restricted to the posterior segment of the eye

Name: isolated microphthalmia 4
Definition: A microphthalmia that has_material_basis_in mutation in the GDF6 gene on chromosome 8q22.

Name: isolated microphthalmia 5
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of posterior microphthalmia

Name: isolated microphthalmia 7
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by unilateral microphthalmia that has_material_basis_in caused by mutation in the GDF3 gene on chromosome 12p13.

Name: isolated microphthalmia 2
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of bilateral profound microphthalmia without associated anomalies and with normal intelligence that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the CHX10 gene on chromosome 14q24.

Name: isolated microphthalmia 1
Definition: A microphthalmia that has_material_basis_in variation in the chromosomal region 14q32.

Name: isolated microphthalmia 8
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by bilateral severe microphthalmia autosomal recessive inheritance of that has_material_basis_in homozygous mutation in the ALDH1A3 gene on chromosome 15q26.

Name: isolated microphthalmia 3
Definition: A microphthalmia characterized by clinical anophthalmia and/or microphthalmia that has_material_basis_in compound heterozygous mutation in the RAX gene on chromosome 18q21.
